# CNContactDepartmentNameKey

**Global Variable**

The contact’s department name.

## Declaration

```swift
let CNContactDepartmentNameKey: String
```

## Discussion

This key takes a string value.

## Work

- **CNContactJobTitleKey**: The contact’s job title.
- **CNContactOrganizationNameKey**: The contact’s organization name.
- **CNContactPhoneticOrganizationNameKey**: The phonetic spelling of the contact’s organization name.

items.description: The phonetic spelling of the contact’s organization name.
